environment_variables.PBS_O_WORKDIR: The directory where the job is submitted.
environment_variables.PBS_JOBID: The job ID assigned by PBS.
environment_variables.MD: A string containing the names of the input files for the simulations.
environment_variables.FIRST: A flag indicating whether it is the first simulation in the loop.
environment_variables.LASTDIR: The directory of the previous simulation.
environment_variables.workdir: The directory for the current simulation.
environment_variables.LOG: The path to the log file for the job.
environment_variables.n_proc: The total number of processors available to the job.
environment_variables.n_node: The number of nodes allocated to the job.
environment_variables.mdp: The name of the current input file for the simulation.
